Wisdom: سَلَامَةُ الدِّينِ وَالدُّنْيَا فِي مُدَارَاةِ النَّاسِ
enWisdom: The safety of [one’s] religion and worldly life is in being amicable with the people

Wisdom: دَارِ النَّاسَ تَأْمَنْ غَوَائِلَهُمْ وَتَسْلَمْ مِنْ مَكَايِدِهِمْ
enWisdom: Be amicable with the people and you will be secure from their tribulations and will remain safe from their sly plots

Wisdom: دَارِ النَّاسَ تَسْتَمْتِعْ بِإِخَائِهِمْ وَالْقَهُمْ بِالْبِشْرِ تُمِتْ أَضْغَانَهُمْ
enWisdom: Be amicable with the people and you will enjoy their brotherhood; meet them with cheerfulness and you will cause their malice to die away

Wisdom: سَلَامَةُ الْعَيْشِ فِي الْمُدَارَاةِ
enWisdom: The soundness of life is in being amicable [with people]

Wisdom: سَالِمِ النَّاسَ تَسْلَمْ دُنْيَاكَ
enWisdom: Be peaceful with people and your world will be safe

Wisdom: سَالِمِ النَّاسَ تَسْلَمْ وَاعْمَلْ لِلْآخِرَةِ تَغْنَمْ
enWisdom: Be peaceful with people and you will be safe; work for the Hereafter and you will be successful

Wisdom: عَوِّدْ نَفْسَكَ السَّمَاحَ وَتَجَنَّبِ الْإِلْحَاحَ يَلْزَمْكَ الصَّلَاحُ
enWisdom: Habituate yourself to forbearance and eschewing importunity, [and as a result] righteousness will adhere to you

Wisdom: مَنْ عَامَلَ بِالرِّفْقِ غَنِمَ
enWisdom: One who acts with leniency, prospers

Wisdom: مَنْ دَارَى النَّاسَ سَلِمَ
enWisdom: One who is amicable with people remains safe

Wisdom: مَنْ سَالَمَ النَّاسَ كَثُرَ أَصْدِقَاؤُهُ وَقَلَّ أَعْدَاؤُهُ
enWisdom: Whoever is peaceful with the people, his friends increase and his enemies decrease?

Wisdom: مَنْ سَالَمَ النَّاسَ سُتِرَتْ عُيُوبُهُ [مَنْ تَتَبَّعَ عُيُوبَ النَّاسِ كُشِفَ عُيُوبُهُ‏]
enWisdom: Whoever is peaceful with the people, his faults remain hidden

Wisdom: مَنْ دَارَى النَّاسَ أَمِنَ مَكْرَهُمْ
enWisdom: One who is amicable with the people is protected from their plotting

Wisdom: مَنْ عَامَلَ النَّاسَ بِالْجَمِيلِ كَافَئُوهُ بِهِ
enWisdom: Whoever deals with the people in a beautiful manner, they respond to him in a similar fashion

Wisdom: مَنْ سَالَمَ النَّاسَ رَبِحَ السَّلَامَةَ
enWisdom: One who is peaceful with the people gains security

Wisdom: مَنْ رَضِيَ مِنَ النَّاسِ بِالْمُسَالَمَةِ سَلِمَ مِنْ غَوَائِلِهِمْ
enWisdom: One who is pleased to live peacefully with the people will be safe from their adversities

Wisdom: مَنْ عَامَلَ النَّاسَ بِالْمُسَامَحَةِ اسْتَمْتَعَ بِصُحْبَتِهِمْ [بالمساحة سلم من غوائلهم‏]
enWisdom: One who deals leniently with people enjoys [and benefits from] their company

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يُدَارِ مَنْ فَوْقَهُ لَمْ يُدْرِكْ بُغْيَتَهُ
enWisdom: He who is not amicable with the one who is above him will not realize his goal

Wisdom: مَنْ أَصْلَحَ [اسْتَصْلَحَ‏] الْأَضْدَادَ بَلَغَ الْمُرَادَ
enWisdom: One who reforms his adversaries attains his goal

Wisdom: مُقَارَبَةُ الرِّجَالِ فِي خَلَائِقِهِمْ أَمْنٌ مِنْ غَوَائِلِهِمْ
enWisdom: Being close to the people in their morals [and habits] is a safeguard from their malice

Wisdom: أَبْقِ يُبْقَ عَلَيْكَ
enWisdom: Preserve [the respect of others] and your respect will be preserved

Wisdom: أَحْسِنْ إِلَى مَنْ تَمْلِكُ رِقَّهُ يُحْسِنْ إِلَيْكَ مَنْ تَمَلَّكَ [يَمْلِكُ‏] رِقَّكَ
enWisdom: Do good to the one who is under your authority and the one under whose authority you are will do good to you
